commits.content:
import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardContent } from '../components/ui/card'; import { Book, DollarSign, Users, TrendingUp, Star, FileText } from 'lucide-react'; import { Badge } from '../components/ui/badge'; import { Button } from '../components/ui/button'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; const AuthorDashboard = () => { const books = [ { id: 1, title: "Your Daily Astrological Guide [English]", cover: "/api/placeholder/200/300", author: "Jay Yadav", price: 150, genre: "Astrology", isbn: "9788198388094", pages: 68, coverType: "Paperback", editions: [ { date: "07 Jan 2025", quantity: 7, mrp: 150, royaltyPercentage: 20, sold: 0, royaltyEarned: 0 } ], authorPurchases: [ { date: "07 Jan 2025", particulars: "Complimentary Copies", quantity: 5, mrp: 150, discount: "100%", total: 0, status: "Paid" } ] }, { id: 2, title: "Nadi Sutras", cover: "/api/placeholder/200/300", author: "Jay Yadav", price: 325, genre: "Nadi Astrology", isbn: "9788197852961", pages: 153, coverType: "Paperback", editions: [ { date: "01 Dec 2024", quantity: 19, mrp: 325, royaltyPercentage: 20, sold: 17, royaltyEarned: 1105 } ] } ]; const totalRoyalties = books.reduce((sum, book) => sum + book.editions.reduce((eSum, edition) => eSum + edition.royaltyEarned, 0), 0 ); const totalSales = books.reduce((sum, book) => sum + book.editions.reduce((eSum, edition) => eSum + edition.sold, 0), 0 ); return (
{/* Header Section */}

Welcome Back, Jay

Your writing journey at a glance

{/* Key Metrics Grid */}
} title="Published Titles" value={books.length} trend="+2% from last month" color="bg-blue-100" /> } title="Total Royalties" value={`₹${totalRoyalties}`} trend="+15% from last quarter" color="bg-green-100" /> } title="Lifetime Sales" value={totalSales} trend="173% annual growth" color="bg-purple-100" /> } title="Reader Reach" value="1.2K+" trend="Active in 3 markets" color="bg-orange-100" />
{/* Book Catalog Section */}

Your Publications

{books.map(book => (

{book.title}

By {book.author} • {book.genre}
{book.editions.map((edition, idx) => (
{edition.date} {edition.sold}/{edition.quantity} sold
Royalty Earned ₹{edition.royaltyEarned}
))}
))}
); }; // Reusable Metric Card Component const MetricCard = ({ icon, title, value, trend, color }) => (
{icon}

{title}

{value}

{trend}
); MetricCard.propTypes = { icon: PropTypes.node.isRequired, title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, value: PropTypes.oneOfType([PropTypes.string, PropTypes.number]).isRequired, trend: PropTypes.string.isRequired, color: PropTypes.string.isRequired }; // Reusable Detail Item Component const DetailItem = ({ label, value }) => (
{label} {value}
); DetailItem.propTypes = { label: PropTypes.string.isRequired, value: PropTypes.oneOfType([PropTypes.string, PropTypes.number]).isRequired }; export default AuthorDashboard;
